wikitext.*:
The '''Oratory School''' is Roman Catholic independent boarding school in Woodcote, Oxfordshire. [[Michael Tolkien|Michael]] and [[Christopher Tolkien]] were pupils there in the 1930s when it was located in Caversham in Berkshire.<ref name="Letters">{{L|16}}</ref> Michael was later a master at the school and when staying with him [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] occasionally covered lessons for absent teachers.
